main.title: GerpBot
main.description: List of commands. Use `@GerpBot help <command>` for more details.

fields.name: `@GerpBot raffle`
fields.value: Randomly selects users from given category.

fields.name: `@GerpBot rng`
fields.value: Get a random number (or numbers). Smallest and biggest number as imputs. If only one number is given the other will be 0.

fields.name: `@GerpBot echo`
fields.value: GerpBot responds with argument determined message. This command will have **no** issues.

fields.name: `@GerpBot uptime`
fields.value: Get uptime since a specific event.

fields.name: `@GerpBot ask`
fields.value: Ask anything! Even works without the `ask` -part, if `?` is used instead: `@GerpBot [<question>]... ? [<question>]...`.

fields.name: `@GerpBot vote`
fields.value: Starts a vote. A really cool one.

fields.name: `@GerpBot play`
fields.value: Adds songs to queue and starts playing. Attachments also supported and must be part of the same message as the command.

fields.name: `@GerpBot music`
fields.value: Music commands and control. Use `@GerpBot play` to start playing.

fields.name: `@GerpBot bs`
fields.value: Play the Blue Square the Game

fields.name: `@GerpBot remind`
fields.value: Reminds after a specific amount of time or at a specific time. Can be sent to another channel or person (PM). A message can also be displayed.

fields.name: `@GerpBot remind`
fields.value: Gives you a list of your reminders or cancel one of your reminders.

fields.name: `@GerpBot timezone`
fields.value: Set your timezone for the bot.

fields.name: Shorter versions of commands are also available:

server.title: Help for `server` -command
server.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot server`
Gives information about the server.

channel.title: Help for `channel` -command
channel.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot channel [<#channel>]`
Gives information about the channel

user.title: Help for `user` -command
user.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot user <@mention>`
Gives information about the user.

role.title: Help for `role` -command
role.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot role <@role>`
Gives information about the role.

osu.title: Help for `osu` -command
osu.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot osu <user>`
Check osu! user's profile.

raffle.title: Help for `raffle` -command
raffle.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot raffle [everyone|here|<@role>] [<number of winners>]`
Randomly selects users from given category.

pi.title: Help for `pi` -command
pi.description:
Usage: `GerpBot pi`
Gives you the π.

rng.title: Help for `rng` -command
rng.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot rng <number>[..<number>] [<amount>]`
Get a random number (or numbers). Smallest and biggest number as imputs. If only one number is given the other will be 0.

nerfThis.title: Help for `nerfThis` -command
nerfThis.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot nerfThis`
Activates D.Va's ultimate ability "Self destruct".

echo.title: Help for `echo` -command
echo.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot echo <message>...`
GerpBot responds with argument determined message. This command will have **no** issues.

uptime.title: Help for `uptime` -command
uptime.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot uptime startUp | connection | lastCommand`
Get uptime since a specific event.

ask.title: Help for `ask` -command
ask.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot ask <question>`
Ask anything! Even works without the `ask` -part, if `?` is used instead: `@GerpBot [<question>]... ? [<question>]...`.

vote.title: Help for `vote` -command
vote.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot vote [gold <user>] <emoji1>[=<option1>]...`
Starts a vote. A really cool one.

play.title: Help for `play` -command
play.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot play [<keywords>...]`
Adds songs to queue and starts playing. Attachments also supported and must be part of the same message as the command.

music.title: Help for `music` -command
music.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot music (cancel <number>) | skip | stop | list | channel`
Music commands and control. Use `@GerpBot play` to start playing.

bs.title: Help for `bs` -command
bs.description:
Usage: `GerpBot bs`
Play the Blue Square the Game

kps.title: Help for `kps` -command
kps.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot kps play | ai | friend <name> | rock | paper | scissors | classic | horror | space | hand | quit`
Play KPS.

ile.title: Help for `ile` -command
ile.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot ile join | leave | here | time`
For more info: `@GerpBot ile`.

remind.title: Help for `remind` -command
remind.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot remind [<#channel>|<@mention>] (([<amount>](ms|s|min|h|d|y))...|[<YYYY>-<MM>-<DD>T]<HH>:<MM>[:<SS>]) [<message>]...`
Reminds after a specific amount of time or at a specific time. Can be sent to another channel or person (PM). A message can also be displayed.
Usage: `@GerpBot remind list | (cancel <number>)`
Gives you a list of your reminders or cancel one of your reminders.

timezone.title: Help for `timezone` -command
timezone.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot timezone +<HH>:<MM> | -<HH>:<MM>`
Set your timezone for the bot.

autoCompliment.title: Help for `autoCompliment` -command
autoCompliment.description:
Usage: Bot autoCompliment sample | on | off | add <@mention> | remove <@mention> | list`
Our little secret :3

shit.title: Help for `shit` -command
shit.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot shit set <@role> | clean`
Makes one role shit.

color.title: Help for `color` -command
color.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot color #<hex> | <decimal> | default`
Changes bot's color.

effect.title: Help for `effect` -command
effect.description:
Usage: `@GerpBot effect rainbow | shuffle`
Toggles GerpBot name effects.
